AT.name: Street Gangs
AT.description: Street Gangs ist die Version für den westlichen Markt des gefeierten japanischen Hits Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari. Es handelt sich dabei um einen einzigartigen Mix aus Beat’em Up und Rollenspiel. Die Freunde Alex und Ryan müssen River City vor dem bösen Slick und seiner Gang retten, die zudem Ryans Freundin Cyndi entführt haben. Bekämpfe Gang-Mitglieder und -Bosse, steigere deine Werte, indem du die richtige Nahrung isst, und erhalte neue Techniken durch das Lesen besonderer Bücher. Spiele allein oder mit zwei Spielern gleichzeitig via Download-Spiel (nur eine Version der Software wird benötigt).

CZ.name: Street Gangs
CZ.description: Street Gangs is the Western version of the acclaimed Japanese hit Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, a unique mix of beat ‘em up and RPG. Friends Alex and Ryan must save River City from the evil Slick and his gang who have also kidnapped Ryan's girlfriend Cyndi. Fight your way through gang members and bosses, raise your stats by eating the right foods, and gain new techniques by reading special books. Play solo or battle with two players simultaneously via Download Play (only one copy of the game is required).

IT.name: Street Gangs
IT.description: Street Gangs è la versione occidentale del tanto acclamato Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, un vero classico del Paese del Sol levante, che unisce i generi picchiaduro e gioco di ruolo. Alex e Ryan, amici per la pelle, devono salvare River City dal crudele Slick e dalla sua gang, che, oltre a terrorizzare la città, hanno anche rapito Cindy, la ragazza di Ryan. Fatti strada affrontando gli sgherri della gang e terribili boss, migliora le tue caratteristiche nutrendoti nel modo giusto e apprendi nuove tecniche leggendo gli appositi manuali. Una sfida avvincente da affrontare da soli o in compagnia di un altro giocatore, giocando insieme grazie alla modalità download (è necessaria solo una copia del software).

FR.name: Street Gangs
FR.description: Street Gangs est la version occidentale de Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, un mélange unique de beat 'em up et de RPG ayant remporté un franc succès au Japon. Alex et Ryan doivent sauver River City du maléfique Slick et de son gang, mais aussi délivrer Cyndi, la petite amie de Ryan. Combattez les membres du gang et leurs boss, ramassez de la nourriture pour monter en puissance et lisez des livres afin d'apprendre de nouvelles techniques. Jouez en solo ou livrez bataille avec un ami via le mode téléchargement (seule une copie du jeu est nécessaire).

NL.name: Street Gangs
NL.description: Street Gangs, de westerse versie van de Japanse kraker Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, is een unieke combinatie van een vechtspel en een RPG. River City gaat gebukt onder de slechte daden van Slick en zijn handlangers. Alex en Ryan, twee beste maten, gaan de strijd aan met Slick: niet alleen om de stad maar ook Cyndi, de vriendin van Ryan, te redden. Versla bendeleden en bazen, verbeter je statistieken door het juiste voedsel te eten en leer nieuwe technieken door speciale boeken te lezen. Speel alleen of met twee spelers tegelijkertijd via Download Play (slechts één exemplaar van het spel is nodig).

LV.name: Street Gangs
LV.description: Street Gangs is the Western version of the acclaimed Japanese hit Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, a unique mix of beat ‘em up and RPG. Friends Alex and Ryan must save River City from the evil Slick and his gang who have also kidnapped Ryan's girlfriend Cyndi. Fight your way through gang members and bosses, raise your stats by eating the right foods, and gain new techniques by reading special books. Play solo or battle with two players simultaneously via Download Play (only one copy of the game is required).

PT.name: Street Gangs
PT.description: Street Gangs é a versão ocidental do aclamado êxito de vendas japonês Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, uma mistura única de beat 'em up e RPG. Os amigos Alex e Ryan devem salvar River City do maléfico Slick e da sua quadrilha, que sequestraram também a namorada de Ryan, Cindy. Luta contra membros e chefes da quadrilha, melhora a tua condição comendo os alimentos adequados e aprende novas técnicas lendo livros especiais. Joga sozinho ou combate com dois jogadores em simultâneo através do Modo Download (é apenas necessária uma cópia do jogo).

RU.name: Street Gangs
RU.description: Представляем Street Gangs, западную версию нашумевшей в Японии игры Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari. Это уникальная смесь файтинга и ролевой игры. Город River City находится под контролем головореза Slick и его банды. Главные герои игры, друзья Alex и Ryan, должны очистить родной город от преступников и освободить Cindy, подружку Ryan, похищенную бандитами. Для этого нашим героям предстоит драться со всеми членами шайки и их главарем. Чтобы улучшить свои показатели, Alex и Ryan должны правильно питаться. А еще им не помешает освоить парочку новых приемов: для этого нужно прочесть специальные книги. Играйте в одиночку или с двумя игроками, используя функцию «Загружаемая игра» (вам понадобится только один экземпляр игры).

PL.name: Street Gangs
PL.description: Street Gangs is the Western version of the acclaimed Japanese hit Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, a unique mix of beat ‘em up and RPG. Friends Alex and Ryan must save River City from the evil Slick and his gang who have also kidnapped Ryan's girlfriend Cyndi. Fight your way through gang members and bosses, raise your stats by eating the right foods, and gain new techniques by reading special books. Play solo or battle with two players simultaneously via Download Play (only one copy of the game is required).

ES.name: Street Gangs
ES.description: Street Gangs es la versión occidental del aclamado éxito de ventas japonés Downtown Nekketsu Monogatari, una mezcla única de beat 'em up y RPG. Alex y Ryan deben salvar River City del malvado Slick y su banda, quienes también han secuestrado a Cyndi, la novia de Ryan. Pelea contra pandilleros y jefes, mejora tu estado alimentándote de forma correcta y aprende nuevas técnicas leyendo libros especiales. Juega tú solo o con otro jugador de forma simultánea a través del modo descarga (solo es necesaria una copia del juego).
